title: FS: NEW Large Lot of T206 Beaters **ALL SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Large Lot of T206 Beaters **ALL SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are all low grade cards as the scans will show. All of these cards have major condition issues and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

**ALL CARDS SOLD...THANKS**
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
One more price drop on the last few cards in this lot.  Thanks for looking!

I will take
Clymer - $11
Dunn - $10
P. Graham (Boston) - $10
F. Jones - $10
I think I have bought over 50% of my Monster from you!!
I sent the money to the wrong person, as soon as it gets refunded I will send it to you!! 100% my fault sorry.
Thanks, Tony.  Cards will go out in the morning.
